name: A Hedgehog's Home
description:
You are a hedgehog in the suburbs. Snuffle and scurry your way through gardens foraging for food and exploring. 

A tiny game by Shaun Wall and Maggie Tan, made in Bitsy for #HedgehogAwarenessWeek.

Press "Run game", then use either the arrow keys or WASD to move around and interact.

Find out more about how you can help hedgehogs in your area over at the British Hedgehog Preservation Society, and consider donating to help them with their great work for the dwindling hedgehog population across the UK!

Music is "Morning Date" by The Poison Oaks
